meanings.definition: The state or quality of being bulging or protruding.
meanings.sent1: The bulginesses of the balloon made it look ready to pop.
meanings.sent2: I noticed the bulginesses of the pillow as I fluffed it.
meanings.sent3: The bulginesses of the overstuffed suitcase made it impossible to close.
meanings.sent4: The bulginesses of the clouds signaled an incoming storm.
meanings.sent5: The bulginesses of the frog's eyes made it look comical.

meanings.definition: The act of bulging or swelling.
meanings.sent1: The sudden bulginesses of the tire indicated a puncture.
meanings.sent2: I felt the bulginesses of my ankle after twisting it.
meanings.sent3: The bulginesses of the balloon were caused by too much air.
meanings.sent4: The bulginesses of the river after heavy rain were impressive.
meanings.sent5: The bulginesses of the bread dough showed it was ready to bake.

meanings.sent1: The bulginesses on the wall indicated a hidden door.
meanings.sent2: I noticed the bulginesses on the fruit that had gone bad.
meanings.sent3: The bulginesses on the tire were a sign of low pressure.
meanings.sent4: The bulginesses on the tree trunk were caused by a growing branch.
meanings.sent5: The bulginesses on the cat's belly made it look adorable.
